name: MTLFunction
desc: An object that represents a public shader function in a Metal library.

items.name: var device: MTLDevice
items.desc: The device object that created the shader function.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the shader function.

items.name: enum MTLFunctionType
items.desc: The type of a top-level Metal Shading Language (MSL) function.

items.name: var options: MTLFunctionOptions
items.desc: The options that Metal used to compile this function.

items.name: struct MTLFunctionOptions
items.desc: Options that define how Metal creates the function object.

items.name: var patchType: MTLPatchType
items.desc: The tessellation patch type of a post-tessellation vertex function.

items.name: var patchControlPointCount: Int
items.desc: The number of patch control points in the post-tessellation vertex function.

items.name: enum MTLPatchType
items.desc: Types of tessellation patches that can be inputs of a post-tessellation vertex function.

items.name: var vertexAttributes: [MTLVertexAttribute]?
items.desc: An array that describes the vertex input attributes to a vertex function.

items.name: var stageInputAttributes: [MTLAttribute]?
items.desc: An array that describes the input attributes to the function.

items.name: var functionConstantsDictionary: [String : MTLFunctionConstant]
items.desc: A dictionary of function constants for a specialized function.

items.name: func makeArgumentEncoder(bufferIndex: Int) -> MTLArgumentEncoder
items.desc: Creates an argument encoder for an argument buffer that’s one of this function's arguments.

items.name: func makeArgumentEncoder(bufferIndex: Int, reflection: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<MTLAutoreleasedArgument?>?) -> MTLArgumentEncoder
items.desc: Creates an argument encoder and returns reflection information for an argument buffer that’s one of this function's arguments
